item.title: Leetcode 0009 Palidrome Number
item.author: guanquanhong@163.com (Sukoshi)

item.title: Leetcode 0452 Mininum Number of Arrows to Burst Balloons

item.title: Leetcode 0242 Valid Anagram
item.author: guanquanhong@163.com (Sukoshi)
item.description: Given two strings s and t , write a function to determine if t is an anagram of s. 给定两个字符串 s 和 t ，编写一个函数来判断 t 是否是 s 的字母异位词。 Example: Input: s = "anagram", t = "nagaram" Output: true Input: s = "rat", t = "car" Output: false

item.title: Leetcode 0147 Insertion Sort List
item.author: guanquanhong@163.com (Sukoshi)
item.description: Sort a linked list using insertion sort. A graphical example of insertion sort. The partial sorted list (black) initially contains only the first element in the list. With each iteration one element (red) is removed from the input data and inserted in-place into the sorted list Algorithm of Insertion Sort: Insertion sort iterates, consuming one input element each repetition, and growing a sorted output list. item.title: Leetcode 0134 Gas Station
item.author: guanquanhong@163.com (Sukoshi)
item.description: There are N gas stations along a circular route, where the amount of gas at station i is gas[i]. You have a car with an unlimited gas tank and it costs cost[i] of gas to travel from station i to its next station (i+1). You begin the journey with an empty tank at one of the gas stations. item.title: Leetcode 1030 Matrix Cells in Distance Order
item.author: guanquanhong@163.com (Sukoshi)
item.description: We are given a matrix with R rows and C columns has cells with integer coordinates (r, c), where 0 <= r < R and 0 <= c < C. Additionally, we are given a cell in that matrix with coordinates (r0, c0). item.title: Leetcode 0001 Two Sum
item.author: guanquanhong@163.com (Sukoshi)
item.description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice. You can return the answer in any order. 给定一个整数数组 nums 和一个目标值 targ
